title: Let It Be? No, Let's Remix The Beatles
description: Producer Giles Martin talks about a new 5-disc deluxe version of Let It Be, one of The Beatles' most complicated albums. Hear his remixed version of the album plus never-before-heard banter and outtakes.
copyright: Copyright 2011-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
